subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Rajasthan's Capital and Other Famous Cities
question_en: Which city served as the capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के पहले राजस्थान की राजधानी के समय के बारे में क्या जानकारी कीजिएगी?
D_en: Rajasthan was the last state to sign the Rajput Sword Pact
D_hi: राजस्थान राजपुत्रों के कमर संग्रेस्ट को पार करने के पूरी सूचना दी जाएगी।
explanation_en: Before Jaipur became the capital of Rajasthan, Udaipur served as the capital during the time of Maharana Pratap Singh.
explanation_hi: महाराणी प्रतीत सिंग के समय में उदयपुर राजधानी के समय में राजस्थान के राजधानी की समय में कौरन में उदयपुर का विभवन्तरीना
explanation_en: Udaipur was the capital of Rajasthan during the reign of Karnavati Dynasty.
explanation_hi: उदयपुर राजधानी के राष्ट्र के मात्रा संतरीना
explanation_en: In the pre-independence era, Udaipur was the capital of Mewar Kingdom.
Jaipur was founded by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II in 1727 AD.
explanation_hi: जयपुर महाराज सावाई जाय सिंघ ई ने 1727 AD के विभवन्तरिना
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Maharaja Man Singh I in the 16th century.
explanation_hi: अमरा कंत्रों के मान सिंघ I ने 16वेंचर के विभवन्तरिना
explanation_en: Jodhpur was founded by Maharaja Rao Jodha in the 15th century.
explanation_hi: जोधपुर माहारा के रावती के रावती, विभवन्तरिना
explanation_en: Rajasthan gained independence from the British in 1947.
Alwar was a part of the Mughal Empire during the reign of Emperor Akbar.
explanation_hi: अलवार एक राजशाल शीकार के विभवन्तरिना, जीती यातरिना
